title: The Big LLM Realm
content: The origin point of all events in the pipeline. Here, users collaborate with powerful LLMs to accomplish real tasks - writing code, making decisions, solving problems. This realm generates the raw material that flows downstream: git diffs, chat histories, concepts touched. The work done here is expensive in tokens and API calls, but it creates the authentic experiences that become lore.
summary: Where users perform actual work with powerful language models
